item.title: TBB Whitepapers
item.description:
TBB Whitepapers/Collateral

Please find the relevant whitepapers and funding collateral for TBB.

The Blockchain Brokerage Whitepaper

TBB whitepaper explains the core concepts of TBB with regards to technology, regulatory and corporate structure of its opearations.

The Blockchain Brokerage Whitepaper

TBB Pre-ICO Term Sheet

Pre-ICO Term sheet outlines the funding structure, governance and liquidation preference.

TBB Pre-ICO Term Sheet

TBB Token Sale and Purchase Agreement

TBB Token Sale and Purchase Agreement explains the TBBSAR token sale and purchase agreement between buyer (“Invtesors/Pre-ICO participants”) and seller (“TBB”).

TBB Token Sale and Purchase Agreement

Procedure for participating in TBB SAR

This is a step-by-step guidance to assist purchasing TBBSAR tokens

Procedure for participating in TBB SAR
